briefTitle: Acute Effects of Exercise on the Cortical Silent Period in Prostate Cancer Patients

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Cortical Silent Period (CSP) Will be Determined Using Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (TMS) of the Motor Cortex.
outcomeMeasures.description: CSP is a measure of cortical inhibition that is negatively related to anxiety, stress, and depression.

outcomeMeasures.title: Profile of Mood States Questionnaire(PoMS)
outcomeMeasures.description: Correlations will be assessed between cortical silent period and acute mood state.

outcomeMeasures.title: State-Trait Anxiety Inventory - Questionnaire(STAI)
outcomeMeasures.description: Correlations will be assessed between cortical silent period and acute anxiety.

outcomeMeasures.title: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - Questionnaire(HADS)
outcomeMeasures.description: Correlations will be assessed between cortical silent period and acute anxiety and depression.

outcomeMeasures.title: Exercise-Induced Feelings Inventory - Questionnaire (EIFI)
outcomeMeasures.description: Correlations will be assessed between cortical silent period and exercise-induced feelings.
